references.paper_title: Federated learning of deep networks using model averaging
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concept and algorithm of Federated Averaging (FedAvg), a cornerstone method in federated learning, which is directly compared against in the current work.

references.paper_title: Federated machine learning: Concept and applications
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of federated machine learning, including its applications and challenges, establishing the context for the current research on one-shot federated learning.

references.paper_title: Federated learning via posterior averaging: A new perspective and practical algorithms
references.reason: This paper proposes a Bayesian approach to federated learning using posterior averaging, which is closely related to the layer-wise posterior aggregation method proposed in the current work.

references.paper_title: A Bayesian federated learning framework with online Laplace approximation
references.reason: This paper utilizes online Laplace approximation for Bayesian federated learning, a technique relevant to the layer-wise posterior approximation in the current work and directly compared against in the results.
